title: Software Engineer Frontend
description:
**Job Description**
 Job Description
   

  

 At Agilent, we advance the quality of life by enabling scientific discovery through world\\-class instruments, software, and services. We’re committed to innovation, collaboration, and excellence. You’ll be part of a team that values creativity, continuous learning, and delivering impactful digital solutions. If you're passionate about eCommerce solutions for Cart, Checkout and much more; and want to help shape the future of online experiences, we’d love to hear from you.
   

  

 This role currently follows a hybrid work model. Work arrangements may evolve based on future business needs
   

  

 What you’ll do
   

  

* Work with a team of engineers to deliver feature set that are crucial to Revenue growth.
* Be a part of a world class global organization.
* Push the bar to solve complex technical challenges of scale and performance.
+ Develop and maintain scalable, responsive web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks (e.g., Angular, React).
+ Collaborate with UX/UI engineers and backend engineers to deliver cohesive and engaging user experiences.
+ Develop new features for customer facing portals.
+ Write clean, maintainable, and well\\-documented code.
+ Optimize applications for speed, scalability, and accessibility.
+ Implement and maintain reusable components and libraries.
+ Conduct code reviews, testing, and debugging to ensure high\\-quality deliverables.
+ Stay current with emerging frontend technologies and best practices.


**Qualifications**
 Required Qualifications
   

  

* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or related field.
* 4\\+ years of experience in frontend development.
* Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and modern frameworks like React or Angular.
* Experience with responsive and mobile\\-first design.
* Familiarity with RESTful APIs and asynchronous programming.
* Strong understanding of cross\\-browser compatibility and web performance optimization.
* Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git).
* Knowledge of security and compliance standards (e.g., HIPAA, GDPR)


 Ways To Stand Out From The Crowd
   

  

* Experience in Code AI tools to gain productivity in coding. Eg. Copilot, Windsurf etc
* Ability to work in a distributed team environment.
* Good written and spoken communications skills are crucial.
* Familiarity with building websites in AEM


**Additional Details**
 This job has a full time weekly schedule.
   

  

 Our pay ranges are determined by role, level, and location. Within the range, individual pay is determined by work location and additional factors, including job\\-related skills, experience, and relevant education or training. During the hiring process, a recruiter can share more about the specific pay range for a preferred location. Pay and benefit information by country are available at: https://careers.agilent.com/locations

title: Software Engineer Developer
description:
Are you a Python expert who has built scalable software solutions? Do you know how to handle heavy volumes of data and process the responses as APIs? Have you worked in scaling AI models or across MLE process?
   

  

 AryaXAI stands at the forefront of AI innovation, revolutionizing AI for mission\\-critical businesses by building explainable, safe, and aligned systems that scale responsibly. Our mission is to create AI tools that empower researchers, engineers, and organizations to unlock AI's full potential while maintaining transparency and safety.
   

  

 Our team thrives on a shared passion for cutting\\-edge innovation, collaboration, and a relentless drive for excellence. At AryaXAI, everyone contributes hands\\-on to our mission in a flat organizational structure that values curiosity, initiative, and exceptional performance.
   

  

 We are looking for Sr Software Engineers who \\-
   

  

* Expert in Python and have built scalable systems.
* Has experience with Puppet/Chef/Ansible, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Git, Graphite and related tools for large\\-scale systems management is a must.
* Should be able to write python, bash, c/c\\+\\+ and perl scripts.
* Good understanding of architecture and tradeoffs in distributed computing environments.
* Experience working with linux system monitoring and analysis.
* Should be hands on Cloud like aws ec, elb, s3 bucket, auto scale etc.
* Better understanding of nginx/Apache web server as reverse proxy , load balancer, caching. H/w, S/w load balancer.
* Experience with web infrastructure, distributed systems, or component\\-oriented software engineering


**What You'll Be Doing**
* Design and implementation of the network that supports for easy deployments of the servers
* Building exciting new features that will enable developers to build highly available, robust AI services
* Maintaining and ensuring a high standard for reliability and availability across multiple datacenters
* Evolving our existing architecture and codebases to support building flexible networking capabilities both internally and for the product


**Desired Skills**
* Very good knowledge in nosql \\- mongodb sharding, clustering , replication , security.
* Knowledge of the different kinds of databases – relational, document, key/value, graph
* Demonstrated open\\-source contribution
* Hand on experience in working in one or major MLE processes like data prep, model serving, compute optimizatons etc.
* Knowledge of TCP/IP and network programming or developing/designing large software systems


**What’ll You Get**
* Highly competitive and meaningful compensation package
* One of the best health care plans that covers not only you but also your family
* A great team
* Micro\\-entrepreneurial tasks and responsibilities.
* Career development and leadership opportunities

title: General Engineering
description:
This role has been designed as ‘’Onsite’ with an expectation that you will primarily work from an HPE office.
   

  

**Who We Are**
 Hewlett Packard Enterprise is the global edge\\-to\\-cloud company advancing the way people live and work. We help companies connect, protect, analyze, and act on their data and applications wherever they live, from edge to cloud, so they can turn insights into outcomes at the speed required to thrive in today’s complex world. Our culture thrives on finding new and better ways to accelerate what’s next. We know varied backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good. If you are looking to stretch and grow your career our culture will embrace you. Open up opportunities with HPE.
   

  

**Job Description**
***Job Family Definition:***
 The job family spans across multiple engineering disciplines. Work consists of designing, developing, analyzing, troubleshooting and debugging systems, software and solutions for research and/or research development of product, services, and solutions for HPE’s portfolio. Requires a broad knowledge and application of engineering disciplines, methodologies and tools.
   

  

 Job Family Definition for Executive Levels only: Directs and manages a diverse team of engineering professionals performing research, development, design and/or implementation of products, services, solutions for the company’s portfolio. Responsible for creating and communicating technical strategy within the organization and/or across the function.
   

  

**Management Level Definition**
 Contributions include applying developed subject matter expertise to solve common and sometimes complex technical problems and recommending alternatives where necessary. Might act as project lead and provide assistance to lower level professionals. Exercises independent judgment and consults with others to determine best method for accomplishing work and achieving objectives.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Designs engineering solutions utilizing multiple engineering disciplines for products, systems, software, and solutions based on established engineering principles and in accordance with development technology practices and guidelines.
* Develops and implements parameters and test plans for new and existing designs, including validation of mechanical, electrical, software, and other engineering specifications and requirements.
* Collaborates and communicates with management, internal, and outsourced development partners regarding design status, project progress, and issue resolution
* Leads a project team of other engineers and internal and outsourced development partners to develop reliable, cost effective and high quality solutions for moderately\\- complex products.
* Represents the mechanical/thermal team for all phases of larger and more\\-complex development projects.
* Provides guidance and mentoring to less\\- experienced staff members.


**Education And Experience Required**
* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Mechanical, Electrical, or other Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent.
* Typically 4\\-6 years experience.


**Knowledge And Skills**
* Multicast Networking: Strong understanding of multicast protocols and configurations.
* VXLAN EVPN: Hands\\-on experience with VXLAN EVPN deployments and troubleshooting.
* Routing Protocols:
+ BGP – Configuration, route policies, and troubleshooting.
+ OSPF – Design and operational knowledge.

* Access Features:
+ DHCP – Server and relay configurations.
+ 802\\.1X (dot1x) – Authentication and security implementation.

* Basic Networking \\& Switching Concepts: VLANs, STP, link aggregation, and Layer 2/Layer 3 fundamentals.
* Automation Skills:
+ Proficiency in Python scripting for test automation and network validation


**Additional Skills**
 Cloud Architectures, Cross Domain Knowledge, Design Thinking, Development Fundamentals, DevOps, Distributed Computing, Microservices Fluency, Full Stack Development, Security\\-First Mindset, User Experience (UX)
   

  

**What We Can Offer You**
**Health \\& Wellbeing**
 We strive to provide our team members and their loved ones with a comprehensive suite of benefits that supports their physical, financial and emotional wellbeing.
   

  

**Personal \\& Professional Development**
 We also invest in your career because the better you are, the better we all are. We have specific programs catered to helping you reach any career goals you have — whether you want to become a knowledge expert in your field or apply your skills to another division.
   

  

**Unconditional Inclusion**
 We are unconditionally inclusive in the way we work and celebrate individual uniqueness. We know varied backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good.
   

  

**Let's Stay Connected**
 Follow @HPECareers on Instagram to see the latest on people, culture and tech at HPE.
   

  

**Job**
 Engineering
   

  

**Job Level**
 TCP\\_03
   

  

 HPE is an Equal Employment Opportunity/ Veterans/Disabled/LGBT employer. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, gender, or any other protected category, and all decisions we make are made on the basis of qualifications, merit, and business need. Our goal is to be one global team that is representative of our customers, in an inclusive environment where we can continue to innovate and grow together. Please click here: Equal Employment Opportunity.
   

  

**Hewlett Packard Enterprise is EEO Protected Veteran/ Individual with Disabilities.**
 HPE will comply with all applicable laws related to employer use of arrest and conviction records, including laws requiring employers to consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories.
   

  

**No Fees Notice \\& Recruitment Fraud Disclaimer**
*It has come to HPE’s attention that there has been an increase in recruitment fraud whereby scammer impersonate HPE or HPE\\-authorized recruiting agencies and offer fake employment opportunities to candidates. These scammers often seek to obtain personal information or money from candidates.*
*Please note that Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE), its direct and indirect subsidiaries and affiliated companies, and its authorized recruitment agencies/vendors
 **will never charge any candidate a registration fee, hiring fee, or any other fee in connection with its recruitment and hiring process.** 
 The credentials of any hiring agency that claims to be working with HPE for recruitment of talent should be verified by candidates and candidates shall be solely responsible to conduct such verification. Any candidate/individual who relies on the erroneous representations made by fraudulent employment agencies does so at their own risk, and HPE disclaims liability for any damages or claims that may result from any such communication.*

title: Manual QA Engineer
description:
**Job Title:** 
  Manual QA Engineer
 



**Company Name:** 
 Ivory Squid Pvt. Ltd.
 



**Employment Type:** 
 Full\\-Time
 



**Work Mode:** 
 Remote (Work From Home)
 



**Working Days:** 
 5 Days per Week
 



**Salary:** 
  ₹4,00,000 – ₹5,00,000 per annum
 



**Experience Required:** 
  1–2 Years
 



  





**About the Opportunity** 




 Talentorix is hiring a Manual QA Engineer for one of its client organizations, Ivory Squid Pvt. Ltd. This role is suitable for professionals with hands\\-on experience in manual testing who are passionate about software quality, testing methodologies, and delivering reliable digital products.
 



  





**Role Overview** 




 As a Manual QA Engineer, you will be responsible for validating web and mobile applications through comprehensive manual testing. You will collaborate closely with development and product teams to ensure functionality, usability, and performance meet business and quality standards.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Perform manual testing of web and mobile applications to identify functional, usability, and performance issues
* Create and maintain detailed test plans, test cases, and test scenarios based on business requirements
* Execute different types of testing including functional, regression, integration, system, and exploratory testing
* Log, track, and manage defects using defect tracking tools and ensure timely resolution
* Work closely with developers, product managers, and analysts to ensure complete test coverage
* Prepare and share test execution reports and quality status updates with stakeholders
* Ensure adherence to QA standards, testing processes, and best practices
* Support release cycles by validating builds before deployment



  





**Skills \\& Requirements** 



* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience)
* 1–2 years of experience in manual QA testing
* Strong understanding of Software Testing Life Cycle (STLC) and QA methodologies
* Hands\\-on experience with test management and defect tracking tools such as Jira, Azure DevOps, or TestRai
* Strong analytical skills with high attention to detail
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills



  





**Who Can Apply** 



* Professionals with 1–2 years of manual QA experience
* Candidates with a strong interest in software quality and testing processes
* Individuals comfortable working in a remote, collaborative environment



  





**Perks \\& Benefits** 



* Competitive annual salary
* Fully remote work opportunity
* Exposure to real\\-world projects and release cycles
* Professional and collaborative work environment



  





**About Talentorix** 




 Talentorix is a staffing and recruitment firm that supports organizations by managing their hiring requirements. We work with client companies to identify suitable candidates and facilitate a structured and transparent recruitment process.

title: Senior Software Engineer QA
description:
**Job Description**
 Job Description
   

  

 At Agilent, we advance the quality of life by enabling scientific discovery through world\\-class instruments, software, and services. We’re committed to innovation, collaboration, and excellence. You’ll be part of a team that values creativity, continuous learning, and delivering impactful digital solutions. If you're passionate about eCommerce solutions for Cart, Checkout and much more; and want to help shape the future of online experiences, we’d love to hear from you.
   

  

 This role currently follows a hybrid work model. Work arrangements may evolve based on future business needs
   

  

 What you’ll do
   

  

* Work with a team of engineers to deliver feature set that are crucial to Revenue growth.
* Be a part of a world class global organization.
* Design and develop comprehensive automation test scripts and frameworks for our constantly updating A/B testing and personalization workflows.
* Collaborate with centralized testing team to integrate automated tests into the CI/CD pipeline.
* Collaborate with the development team to understand product features and technical specifications to create effective test plans and strategies.
* Perform functional, regression, and performance testing.
* Analyze test results, identify defects, and work with developers to resolve them.
* Mentor QA engineers to deliver better QA coverage and results.


**Qualifications**
 Required Qualifications
   

  

* Bachelor's or Master's Degree or equivalent.
* 8\\+ years of relevant experience in QA and automation dev.
* Collaborate with the development team to understand product features and technical specifications to create effective test plans and strategies.
* Perform functional, regression, and performance testing.
* Analyze test results, identify defects, and work with developers to resolve them.
* Experience writing exceptional test cases in JIRA, Cucumber etc.
* Experience with test automation frameworks like Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, or Appium.
* Solid understanding of the software development lifecycle (SDLC) and QA methodologies.
* Experience with setting up test automation with CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI).
* Programming skills in Python, JavaScript, React, Java
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Strong communication skills and a collaborative perspective.
* Experience in Using generative AI for test case generation and execution


 Ways to stand out from the crowd

title: Labview Developer
description:
**Company Description**
  

 DhaSh Engineering \\& Automation Pvt. Ltd, established in 2022, is a leading provider of customized turnkey assembly and testing solutions. The company specializes in catering to industries such as Automotive, Electrical \\& Electronics, Medical \\& Pharma, and other engineering sectors. With a focus on innovation, precision, and tailored services, DhaSh Engineering \\& Automation Pvt. Ltd ensures optimal solutions to meet client requirements. The organization strives to deliver high\\-quality engineering services that drive customer success.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 This is a full\\-time, on\\-site role for a Labview Developer based in Bengaluru. The developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining applications using LabVIEW specifically for test and measurement, automation, and data acquisition applications. Key responsibilities include system integration, troubleshooting, implementation of complex algorithms in LabVIEW, and collaborating closely with the engineering team to meet project requirements and deadlines.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Proficiency in LabVIEW programming and experience developing test and automation systems.
* Experience with system integration, hardware interfacing, and data acquisition tools.
* Strong analytical, problem\\-solving, and debugging skills for troubleshooting issues in test and automation systems.
* Understanding of electrical and electronic systems, as used in engineering domains like Automotive, Medical, and Electronics.
* Ability to create documentation detailing system design, software architecture, and testing procedures.
* Effective communication and collaboration skills to work within multidisciplinary teams and interact with clients.
* Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Electronics, or a related field. Certification in LabVIEW programming (e.g., CLAD or higher) is a plus.

description:
**About the Company** 




  





  





 We are a leading technology firm committed to delivering innovative solutions that empower businesses. Our mission is to leverage cutting\\-edge technology to drive efficiency and growth while fostering a collaborative and inclusive culture.
 



  





  





**About the Role** 




  





  





 The Java Technical Lead will play a crucial role in leading development teams and driving the design and implementation of complex applications using Java and AWS technologies.
 



  





  





**Responsibilities** 




  





  




* Lead and mentor development teams in Java and AWS software design and development
* Architect, design, and develop complex, mission\\-critical applications
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to define technical requirements and ensure seamless integration of software components
* Ensure code quality, adherence to coding standards, and performance optimization
* Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues and provide guidance to team members
* Lead technical discussions, code reviews, and knowledge sharing sessions
* Stay updated with the latest Java, AWS and web technologies tools, and best practices
* Contribute to the development of technical documentation and system architecture diagrams



  









**Qualifications** 




  





  




* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field
* Minimum of 5\\-8 years of hands\\-on experience in Java and AWS development



  









**Required Skills** 




  





  




* Proven experience in leading development teams and projects
* Strong proficiency in Java, including Java EE and Spring boot Framework
* Proficiency in JDBC, JPA, CRUD operations and unit testing framework like Junit
* In\\-depth knowledge of software design patterns and best practices
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and ability to handle complex technical challenges
* Effective communication and leadership abilities
* Experience with agile software development methodologies



  









**Preferred Skills** 




  





  




* Java and AWS certifications
* Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP)

title: Founding Full-Stack AI Engineer – High Caliber Exceptional Talent Only
description:
🚀
 **Founding Software Engineer \\- AI\\-powered Full\\-stack (Python, React Next.js, AWS)** 




 📍
 **Hyderabad (Hybrid)** 
 \\| Remote to start (India)
 



 🏢
 **Airawath \\| Early\\-Stage Consumer AI Startup** 




 💼
 **Full\\-time \\| High Ownership \\| Founding Team Role** 




 Airawath is building a next\\-generation consumer experience that blends AI\\-driven personalization, intelligent recommendations, creative automation, and modern celebration workflows. We're on a mission to redefine how people discover meaningful gifts, create invitations, and connect through technology.
 



 We are hiring our
 **Founding Software Engineers** 
 — someone who is exceptional, product\\-driven, and excited to build modern consumer applications from the ground up.
 



 This role is ideal for engineers who love ownership, move fast, think deeply, and want to help shape an ambitious AI\\-first product.
 



  





 📩
 **How to Apply** 




 MUST fill the Google form for initial valuation while you submit your application on LinkedIn
 



 https://forms.gle/VoYkwLtxNQHPMuD29
 



 You may send your resume/GitHub/portfolio to the address below for faster response
 



 📧
 **sarath@analyticera.io** 




  





 ⭐
 **What You Will Build** 




 You will work directly with the founder and CTO to build core components of the Airawath platform:
 



**1\\. AI/ML Personalization \\& Recommendation Systems** 



* Semantic search \\& embeddings
* Gift recommendation logic
* Ranking \\& personalization algorithms
* LLM\\-driven conversational flows
* AI\\-assisted user profiling



**2\\. Consumer Features (Web/Mobile)** 



* E\\-invitation templates \\& workflows
* Social\\-style interactions (feeds, interests, sharing)
* Event \\& celebration flows
* User dashboards, preferences, and onboarding



**3\\. Creative Graphic Automation** 



* Template generation engines
* Prompt → design generation
* Canvas rendering (Fabric.js / WebGL)
* Dynamic design tools \\& interactive editors
* Lottie/SVG asset manipulation



**4\\. Backend, API \\& Cloud Architecture** 



* Python\\-based APIs (FastAPI/Django)
* Event\\-driven architecture
* Optimized database models
* AWS deployment \\& infra
* Scalable, clean service design



 You will be responsible for delivering high\\-quality, reliable, and scalable features end to end.
 



  





 🎯
 **Who We're Looking For** 




 We are hiring
 **top\\-tier engineering talent** 
 with:
 



 ✔ Strong technical depth
 



 ✔ Sound judgment \\& clarity of thought
 



 ✔ High ownership \\& initiative
 



 ✔ Ability to work in fast\\-paced environments
 



 ✔ Passion for building consumer experiences
 



 ✔ Startup mindset and willingness to learn quickly
 



 You don’t need to have done all of this before — but you must be capable, motivated, and excited to build at a high standard.
 



  





 🧠
 **Required Technical Skills** 




 You must be strong in most of the following:
 



**AI/ML \\+ Data** 



* Experience with recommendation systems, embeddings,
 **ranking** 
 models
* LLM integration (OpenAI/Anthropic/HuggingFace)
* Vector search (Pinecone / Weaviate / Milvus / FAISS)
* Semantic search \\& personalization logic



**Backend (Python)** 



* Python (FastAPI / Django / Flask)
* Building high\\-quality APIs
* Authentication, user flows, session management
* Event\\-driven services, queues (Redis/Kafka optional)
* AWS (Lambda, S3, DynamoDB/RDS, CloudWatch)



**Frontend (React)** 



* React.js / Next.js
* Component\\-level design
* Responsive UI
* Strong UX intuition
* Pixel\\-perfect implementation



**Creative Automation (Bonus)** 




 Experience in at least one is a strong plus:
 


* HTML5 Canvas
* WebGL
* Fabric.js / Konva.js
* Lottie animations
* SVG pipelines
* Generative design tools



 🧩
 **Soft Skills \\& Culture Fit** 




 We value people who:
 


* Take ownership and follow through
* Communicate clearly and work transparently
* Are structured in thinking and execution
* Can balance speed with quality
* Thrive in an early\\-stage startup environment
* Are flexible, reliable, and proactive
* Bring curiosity, creativity, and high standards
* Work exclusively with full commitment (no freelancing)



 We aim to build a culture of excellence, focus, and continuous improvement — without politics or unnecessary complexity.
 



 🎓
 **Preferred Background** 




 Not mandatory, but great to have:
 


* Experience at a fast\\-moving tech startup
* Degree in Computer Science/Engineering from a reputed top tech institution
* Experience building AI\\-powered consumer apps
* Exposure to design tools, creative automation, or visual editors



 💰
 **Compensation** 



* **Salary:** 
 Competitive \\& based on experience
* **Equity:** 
 Offered as part of the founding team (will be discussed after a year of journey)
* **Experience:** 
 3–6 years preferred
* **Role:** 
 Full\\-time, core engineering team
* **Probation:** 
 Standard 90\\-day evaluation period

 \\#MLEngineer \\#LLMEngineer \\#FullStackDeveloper \\#PythonDeveloper
 



 \\#ReactDeveloper \\#RecommendationSystems \\#SemanticSearch
 



 \\#GenerativeAI \\#CreativeAutomation \\#CanvasEditorEngineer

title: Win 11 Engineer L3 (Friday Drive)
description:
TCS has been a great pioneer in feeding the fire of young techies like you. We are a global leader in the technology arena and there’s nothing that can stop us from growing together.
 



**What we are looking for** 




**Role: Win 11 Engineer L3** 




**Experience Range: 8 – 14 Years** 




**Location: Hyderabad/Pune** 




**Interview: Friday Online Interview** 




**Must Have:** 




 Technical:
 



**Role Summary** 




 Highly skilled Windows 11 Engineer (L3\\) to provide advanced technical support, design, and implementation for Windows 11 environments in an enterprise setting. This role involves troubleshooting complex issues, managing OS deployments, and ensuring compliance with security and performance standards.
 


* Design and implement Windows 11 deployment strategies using tools like Microsoft Intune, SCCM/MECM, and Windows Autopilot.
* Provide Level 3 support for Windows 11\\-related incidents and problems.
* Diagnose and resolve complex OS, driver, and application compatibility issues.
* Collaborate with L1/L2 teams for escalations and root cause analysis.
* Configure Group Policies, security baselines, and compliance settings.
* Manage OS upgrades, patches, and feature updates.
* Monitor system performance and optimize configurations for stability and speed.
* Implement endpoint security measures and hardening techniques.
* Ensure adherence to organizational and regulatory compliance standards.
* Develop PowerShell scripts for automation, reporting, and remediation.
* Utilize PSADT for application packaging and deployment (if applicable).
* Create custom scripts for troubleshooting and proactive maintenance.
* Maintain detailed documentation for configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps.
* Conduct training sessions for L1/L2 teams and end\\-users.



**Good to Have:** 



* Endpoint management and enterprise mobility solutions.
* Ability to handle multiple technology tasks and work independently as well as a team member
* Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert
* Certifications: Microsoft Certified: Endpoint Administrator Associate or Azure certifications preferred.



**Essential:** 



* Flexible working in 24\\*7 environment
* Flexible to work on weekends
* Good communication skills to deal with customer
* End\\-to\\-End knowledge of activities being done



**Minimum Qualification:** 




 •15 years of full\\-time education
 



 •Minimum percentile of 50% in 10th, 12th, UG \\& PG (if applicable)
